area: 5-foot-wide, 10-foot-tall, 10-foot deep section of wooden, plaster, or stone wall
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 5" pfs="Standard">[Passwall](/Spells.aspx?ID=216)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Earth" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=55" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 356 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Spell Lists**
[Elemental](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=5)

**Deity**
[Dranngvit](/Deities.aspx?ID=86)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Area** 5-foot-wide, 10-foot-tall, 10-foot deep section of wooden, plaster, or stone wall

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 hour
</row>

</column>

---

You create a visible tunnel through the wall in the chosen area, replacing the area with empty space. If the wall is thicker than 10 feet, the tunnel ends 10 feet in. Even a small layer of metal in the wall prevents this spell from functioning. This spell doesn't reduce the integrity of the structure. When the spell ends, anyone inside the tunnel is shunted to the nearest exit.

---
**Heightened (7th)** The tunnel can be up to 20 feet deep. The areas of the wall that contain your tunnel's entrance appear completely normal (unless viewed with [_true seeing_](/Spells.aspx?ID=344) or a similar effect), despite the tunnel's existence. The tunnel's entrance functions as a solid wall, but you can specify a password or a [trigger](/Rules.aspx?ID=301), allowing creatures to enter the tunnel freely.
name: Passwall

<summary>
Form an earthen tunnel through a wall.
</summary>

text: Passwall Source Core Rulebook pg. 356 4.0 Traditions Arcane, Primal Spell Lists Elemental Deity Dranngvit Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Range touch Area 5-foot-wide, 10-foot-tall, 10-foot deep section of wooden, plaster, or stone wall Duration 1 hour --- You create a visible tunnel through the wall in the chosen area, replacing the area with empty space. If the wall is thicker than 10 feet, the tunnel ends 10 feet in. Even a small layer of metal in the wall prevents this spell from functioning. This spell doesn't reduce the integrity of the structure. When the spell ends, anyone inside the tunnel is shunted to the nearest exit. --- Heightened (7th) The tunnel can be up to 20 feet deep. The areas of the wall that contain your tunnel's entrance appear completely normal (unless viewed with true seeing or a similar effect), despite the tunnel's existence. The tunnel's entrance functions as a solid wall, but you can specify a password or a trigger, allowing creatures to enter the tunnel freely.
